Calling a game ‘no frills’ or ‘no nonsense’ is always a back-handed compliment, because it sounds like you're saying it's a bit straightforward and simple. And yes, that’s exactly what I’m saying here. Acts Of Blood feels like a spiffy PS2 action brawler; a slightly tighter old Yakuza game, or a stripped-back Sifu. It’s snacky and a bit janky, but it’s also great coffee break fodder, assuming you want to spend your break breaking a selection of heavy objects over the crumbly skulls of ne’er-do-wells. I mean, they might have done some things well, I don’t know them. But they aren’t doing any well to my character in the game, so violence it is.
Read more
articles.title: The Raid homage Acts Of Blood is Sifu’s jankier, snackier cousin

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
There must be hundreds of typewriters in the hall, their collective clacks a tidal wave of soulless automation, rising up to greet agent Kiran Estevez as she enters, pistol and flashlight in hands. Exploring rooms to the side, Alan Wake 2: The Lake House’s star finds whiteboards and documents revealing the typewriter’s purpose: to mimic Wake’s writing. Pages are graded along criteria such as ‘style’, ‘tone’, and ‘content’, then “fed into the algorithm” as references until “near-identical stories” to Wake’s can be produced.
“If Jules could simply cut the painter open and pull the painting out of him, he would,” reads one of the real Alan’s typewritten pages. That’s Jules Marmont, the obsessive head of the titular FBC centre. The Marmonts - Jules and his wife Diana - are running experiments to forcibly and synthetically create works of art, aiming to mimic creative passion convincingly enough for the paranatural entity inside Cauldron Lake to respond, as it has in the past.
Read more
articles.title: Alan Wake 2’s The Lake House is a dark, brilliant parable on the devaluation of art and artists

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Putting aside my natural annoyance at Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater for almost beating out the Twarhammer series in the headline real estate wars, I am more than a little excited to play. Some days, you simply must feast on a tree frog, and while we still don’t have a solid release date, that day doesn’t feel too far away. Good news for stealth fans, and perhaps gooder news for a dozen strapline writers sweating profusely, soiling themselves in anticipation of using “kept you waiting, huh?”.
Until then, I at least have a steady drip feed of new information to keep me sated, the latest of which is the substantial hint that there'll be some new dialogue in the game, as per the video below. Alongside that, the previously pseudonymous Suzetta Miñet - who was credited with voicing EVA in MGS3 and Peace Walker - has revealed herself to be Jodi Benson, the voice of Ariel in Disney’s The Little Mermaid. Cheers for the spot, Automaton West.
Read more
articles.title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater will have new dialogue, and EVA’s actor reveals why she chose a pseudonym based on her pet dog

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Foxhole is one of my favourite games to read about, even if I don't play it. It's a massively multiplayer World War 2 game, viewed from above, where battlefield logistics matters as much as aiming and flanking. Its developers have just announced a major new update coming next summer, Foxhole: Airborne, which adds planes to the game for the first time.

Planes, in a topdown MMO? It makes a little more sense if you watch the trailer.

 
Read more
articles.title: Foxhole is getting planes next summer and an infantry combat overhaul later this month

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
We'll have a review of Planet Coaster 2 soon, but I keep making Brendy do other tasks so he's not had enough time yet to ride the rails. That means it falls to me to at least let you know that Frontier's theme park builder is out now.

 
Read more
articles.title: Planet Coaster 2 is out now, adding water slides and pools to the theme park construction sim

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I would never have predicted there'd be an isometric tactics game based on run-and-gun series Metal Slug, yet here Metal Slug Tactics is, and I am here for it. We've been following its development for a while but it's out now on Steam, and seemingly as strong as its demo suggested.

 
Read more
articles.title: Metal Slug Tactics, the surprising genre-twist of the classic run-and-gunner, is out now

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description: PC gaming news, previews, reviews, opinion.
articles.title: Deus Ex was always sh....wait no comments are back sorry sorry I'm trying to delete it

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
"Never read the comments," is a truth much-rehearsed by senior games journalists, but I have long since levelled-up past this axiom and entered into a new world of benevolent narcissism. I always read the comments, for all commenters are my children. They exist to glorify and preserve me in my dotage. True, occasionally my children say things like "I think your writing and opinions are appalling, and that you deserve to be repeatedly run over by a herd of deer", but it is the nature of children to rebel.
 Read more
articles.title: Oh thank Horace, our comments system is up and running again

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Halo Infinite recently received a big update in the form of Delta Arena, a playlist that features recreations of Halo 2's most popular maps and a special third-person mode. The true highlight, though, is yet to come. And that's through an entirely different Halo game: The Master Chief Collection. Soon enough, you'll be able to play Halo 2's lost E3 demo on it, thanks to some lovely modders.
Read more
articles.title: Halo 2's lost E3 2003 demo will finally be playable thanks to modder magic

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Back in the misty reaches of time (March) popular farming sim Stardew Valley got a big update that added more pets to the game (it also let you drink mayonaise but let's not get sidetracked). Those new cats, dogs, and turtles had the cute distinction of being able to wear hats, should you choose to kit your wee friends out. Now, following many months of smaller updates to the game, it seems those hats are causing a problem. "[If] you are experiencing performance issues in Stardew Valley 1.6, remove all hats from pets," said creator Eric Barone in a xeet. When asked the lore-accurate cause of this problem, he blamed: "a strange rash".

 
Read more
articles.title: Stop putting hats on your pets, asks Stardew Valley creator

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Steam's built-in game recording feature has been usable in beta since the summer, but it has now been properly launched for every user, following a client update to Steam yesterday. It's basically another method of capturing funny ragdoll glitches and posting them on the "lol-games-are-dumb" channel of your friend's Discord. Or for posting that flukey knife throw in Call Of Duty to Twitter, as if you really meant to kill the man from across the map all along. Or saving a clip for your personal records, like the footage of that time you yeeted an innocent citizen off the 50-foot wall of a castle town in Dragon's Dogma 2. We all do that, right? Right?
Read more
articles.title: You can now make video clips using Steam's built-in game recording feature, as an update rolls it out to all users

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
We’re still a week away from Blizzard’s Warcraft 30th Anniversary Direct next Wednesday the 13th of November, but art from an apparent remaster of 1995 real time strategy game Warcraft II: Tides Of Darkness has leaked online, via Xibbly user Stiven. It’s a thin one, as far as leaks go, but does show what looks to be cover, logo art, and a Battle.net icon. Thanks for the spot, Percy Coswald Gamer.
Read more
articles.title: Warcraft 2: Tides Of Darkness Remastered apparently leaks ahead of the RTS series’ 30th anniversary direct next week

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Ogres, Orcs, and Khorne are all on the way in the upcoming expansion for strategy game Total War: Warhammer 3, and Creative Assembly have just released their latest dev vlog with a few more details on what to expect. There’s still no word on the exact title, although given the established naming convention (Shadows Of Change, Thrones Of Decay), I’m tentatively calling it “Sniffers Of Glue” in honour of the No Think, Only Krump faction selection.
You’ll find the vlog in its full glory below. What’s interesting about this one is that vlog mainstay director Rich Alridge has brought along some new faces: battle designer Josh King and audio director Chris Goldsmith. And, yes, so no-one can accuse me of burying the lede: that audio design involved the enthusiastic, deeply disgusting slurping of porridge and yoghurt, and the jangling of real bones. The source of the bones is not revealed.
Read more
articles.title: Total War: Warhammer 3’s next DLC is brought to life with porridge, yoghurt and real bones

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Enshrouded has received what developers Keen Games are calling the survival game's "most sizable" update yet, sizable being an appropriate word for mountains. Expect a new playable area, the Alabaneve Summits, with its own enemies, resources, non-threatening wildlife and quests. The maximum character level has risen to 35! There are new townsfolk to find and place in your poorly built houses! You can tame animals, and make them live in poorly built houses too! You can get hypothermia!
 Read more
articles.title: Enshrouded's "largest update so far" is out with a new mountain region, pets and single-player pausing

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I've spent quite a lot of today trying to figure out why, exactly, some of the monsters in the Monster Hunter Wilds beta looked like bundles of copulating pyramids slathered in crocodile gravy. Nic clued me in on this reddit thread earlier, which cites unnamed Chinese players who've allegedly data-mined the beta's monster models, and learned that they are extremely large, encompassing hundreds of thousands of polygons.
If every monster in Monster Hunter Wilds were that fancy all of the time, your computer would become a volcano. As such, the game resorts to loading-on-demand systems to ensure that you only see those gorgeous details when the monsters are close by and, as the case may be, angrily sitting on you. When they're further afield, the flourishes fall away to free up memory and processing power. The popular Redditor explanation for the presence of monsters that look like Henry Moore sculpture is basically that the LOD systems are being forgetful, and neglecting to load the additional polygons at proximity.
  
Read more
articles.title: Buggy monsters in Monster Hunter Wilds have sparked a wave of low-poly animal adoration

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
As a yearly blockbuster, Call of Duty, through sheer expense and effort, would like you to think it is the Die Hard of video games. Or, depending on the setting, the Saving Private Ryan of video games. But it is barely Black Hawk Down. This latest campaign in Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 reminds me more of the forgettable Netflix shootfests that thumbnail their way across your TV screen as you try to find some gritty nothing to aid you in zoning out of life. Still, there is an anecdotal contingent of casual sofa sitters for whom Call Of Duty is the game. A balls-to-the-wall shooter to return to every winter and rinse through in a weekend. Ed has already gestured at its multiplayer, announcing: "yup, it's COD", like a deeply tired Captain Birdseye inspecting the day's catch, wondering when his life will change. But never mind that. How does the single player story mode hold up? Some are calling it the best campaign in years. And I guess that's true, in the sense that it is the least worst.
Read more
articles.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 campaign review: a military shooter that comes disguised as other, better games

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Discourse? Look mate, I’m just here to test the Steam Deck. Dragon Age: The Veilguard runs like a tap on any halfway decent desktop hardware, so was naturally going to be worth trying on the weaker Deck. And sure enough, Bioware’s RPG (which is really more of an action game with the occasional verbal spar) settles comfortably into handheld life.
In fact, Valve have festooned its Steam page with a Verified medal, a seal of approval for any game that performs and controls well on the Steam Deck without any glaring weaknesses or impractical annoyances. It’s still worth playing around with the settings – more on those later – but I’ll back up that official assessment, having played for several hours without so much as an undersized tooltip.
Read more
articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard is Veil-good on the Steam Deck

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The trailer for Bambas! starts off innocently enough. It's an "innovative urban walking simulator" in which you play a disembodied pair of shoes, individually moved with a controller's analog sticks and trigger buttons. The first half of the trailer is all whimsy and playground fun - kicking a football, standing on a climbing frame, riding a skateboard. But then a note of darkness creeps in, as the player begins to channel the sheer nihilistic inconsequentiality of a world in which shoes have no thinking human bodies to restrain them. 
Read more
articles.title: Bambas! is Untitled Shoes Game

articles.author: Robert Anderson
articles.description:
Hori's latest addition to its controller lineup, the "Horipad Wireless for Steam," is now available for preorder on Amazon. After already releasing in Japan at the end of October, now the gamepad is coming to the US.
 Read more
articles.title: Hori’s spiritual successor to the Steam Controller is up for preorder on Amazon today

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
To say that Factorio: Space Age throws out the rulebook is an understatement. It'd be more fitting to say it's somehow automated the whole process: an inserter plucked out the rulebook from my brain and deposited it in hot magma, while a new rulebook was churned out in a nearby machine and plopped into my brain from the other side - only for that to be immediately plucked out and incinerated as well. With each new planet and each new phase, Space Age reinvents itself. I'm battling hyperbole here, but ah hell, I admit defeat. Factorio: Space Age is a masterpiece, the final form of perhaps the most well-crafted building game I'll ever play.
 Read more
articles.title: Factorio: Space Age review: a stellar expansion produces a masterful final form

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
I have zero archaeology experience or knowledge, but I bet archaeologists really love their jobs (for the most part). They get to analyse and discover cool artefacts and educate us on the histories of forgotten civilisations. That's dreamy stuff, that is. But I do wonder what it's like for archaeologists to discover and study something they shouldn't have; something with a disturbing secret - a curse, maybe. Bite-sized horror game The Children Of Clay explores this idea and I'd like more of it, please.
Read more
articles.title: This bite-size free horror game has you study an ancient artefact that holds a dark secret

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Much the same as anyone with a soul, I find ants deeply fascinating and, much the same as anyone who occasionally drops small pieces of sandwich on the floor, I will continue to uphold my respect for them as long as they come nowhere near my feet. Yes. I admit it: I am a bug hypocrite, loudly extolling their virtue and beauty at a distance then getting irritated if they decide to come sit on me.
Fortunately, real time strategy Empire Of The Ants understands that the best place for insects to be is inside a screen, where they can be appreciated but cannot under any circumstances touch you. It’s out this week, as it happens, and here’s a new launch trailer to celebrate. Follow your pheromone trail to the video below.
Read more
articles.title: Here’s a new launch trailer for Attenborough-em-up RTS Empire Of The Ants, out this week

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Early reactions to Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 multiplayer range from frothing dislike through omnimovement hype to our own Ed Thorn's dead-eyed appraisal that it's "a good one, I think. Not a bad one. If you like Call Of Duty, you will like this. If you don't like Call Of Duty, you will not like this." I feel like we need to emergency-deploy a supply crate of smelling salts, because the sheer OK-ness of Black Ops 6 appears to have tumbled Ed into a stupor. 


Perhaps it would be a different story if he'd encountered some of the spawning issues and glitches people are talking about, with players joining games and materialising right into a hail of fire. The players in question include Black Ops 6's developers, who comically note in the latest Black Ops 6 patch notes that "Yes, we saw ourselves in a Killcam before selecting a Loadout too." The latest patch seeks to address this, naturally. As regards the campaign side of things, it also resets your safehouse currency to 5000, if you've had your single player funds stolen (or multiplied) by technical gremlins.
 
Read more
articles.title: Black Ops 6 devs still looking into unfair spawning - "yes, we saw ourselves in a Killcam before selecting a Loadout too"

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Beloved roguelike traumatic-childhood-em-up The Binding Of Issac: Rebirth turned 10 yesterday, and it’s half off on Steam to celebrate. What’s more, maker Edmund McMillen has announced that the foretold online co-op update is due on the 18th of this month, alongside a “considerable” balance update. Consider me considering the considerability of said considerable update!
Read more
articles.title: The Binding Of Isaac: Rebirth celebrates 10 year anniversary with online co-op announcement and sale

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
While we're getting a Gears Of War prequel in Gears Of War: E-Day, this does mean that Gears Of War 6 is yet to be a thing. In a recent episode of IGN's Podcast Unlocked, former Gears Of War director and current Diablo 4 lead Rod Fergusson revealed what his plans were for Gears 6 when he left. In short, he was going to take the game to space. Righto.
Read more
articles.title: Diablo 4 director's plan for Gears Of War 6 was to blast the beefcakes to another planet

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Minor spoilers for the first few hours of Veilguard and heavy spoilers for Baldur’s Gate 3
For all the things I ended up enjoying about Dragon Age: The Veilguard, it isn’t much of an RPG. What little roleplaying it does offer revolves around what flavour of supportive hero you prefer, and you can count the number of impactful dialogue decisions on a three-fingered hand. This might sound utterly damning in the wake of Baldur's Gate 3’s incredible reactivity, and if I approached games as some sort of tedious comparative intellectual exercise rather than just, y’know, seeing how I felt about them, then I suppose it would be. Weirdly, though, the recent memory of Baldur’s Gate 3 didn’t diminish my time with Veilguard at all. It was actually the opposite: it freed Dragon Age from having to carry the torch for a certain period in Bioware’s history, and let me enjoy Veilguard for what it was.
Read more
articles.title: Baldur’s Gate 3's reactivity didn’t ruin Veilguard's linearity for me - it let me enjoy it more

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Twitch have introduced a new "Politics and Sensitive Social Issues" label for streams that "focus" on topics like "elections, civic integrity, and war or military conflict". As with the streaming giant's existing labels for M-rated material, sexual themes or depictions of gambling, the idea is that viewers can filter out such streams in advance by altering their settings.
Advertisers, similarly, can "make better choices about the content they want to advertise next to" - in other words, pull their ads from a whole swathe of material if they don't want to be associated with anything controversial. Twitch's hope is that "the labels will allow advertisers to have more context to inform which types of streams they show their ads alongside, which we expect to increase brands’ confidence in running ads on Twitch, and could bring new advertisers to our service."
  
Read more
articles.title: Twitch introduce mandatory "Politics and Sensitive Social Issues" label, just in time for the US election

articles.author: Rick Lane
articles.description:
It’s tempting to frame Straftat as a throwback to an older, better time for the multiplayer FPS, when the lingo was coded in frags and gibs and sucking it down, when satisfaction was drawn entirely from performance rather than some convoluted, artificial system of progression. Not only would this be inaccurate, but it would also do a disservice to what Straftat truly is, namely a wild overcorrection in response to the direction of modern multiplayer gunfests, one that careens straight through retro stations to arrive somewhere new and exciting.
Read more
articles.title: Straftat review: an anarchic First-Person Speed dater you'll fall in love with

articles.author: RPS
articles.description:
The mystery surrounding Deadlock, Valve’s work-in-progress MOBA shooter, has largely evaporated. Its freely extendable invite system is about as effective at controlling player headcount as a disinterested football steward, meaning pretty much anyone with a clued-in Steam friend can get in and start poking around its secrets. And yet, being a lane-pushing wizard fighter in the Dota 2 vein, it’s already a vast tangle of interplaying abilities, items, strats, and often unspoken rules, of the kind that even experienced gankists will take hundreds of hours to learn. It’s been too much for poor Brendy, at any rate.
Still, Brendy is but one man. What if we had but four men, working in tandem to crush lanes and flatten Patrons just as Gabe intended? To find out if Deadlock is indeed more comprehensible as a team sport, Graham, Ed, Ollie, and James joined forces, promptly getting fucked up yet emerging from the warlock hospital with a deeper understanding of its workings. Or, at least, if anyone would keep playing.
Read more
articles.title: We’ve learned the hard way that ganging up on Deadlock doesn’t make it more digestible

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
When nightmarish sci-fi extraction shooter The Forever Winter launched into early access in September it was somewhat messy. Bugs and maddening enemy spawns diminished the tension of being a fleshy human scavenger in a mech battlefield. But one feature annoyed some players much more - fresh water. See, you need to keep your headquarters stocked with water, as it gets steadily used by your settlement's inhabitants. The catch being that this water diminishes even while you're not playing the game. If it runs out completely, then everything you've collected gets wiped. The developers have listened to complaints about this most Farmville of mechanics, and they've answered in an interesting way. Water thieves! Now, on top of the usual downward trickle, burglars will come to steal your H2O as well.
It's not as bad as it sounds.
Read more
articles.title: The Forever Winter devs answer complaints about water scarcity... by adding thieves who invade your HQ and steal your water

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I didn't sleep last night for entirely self-inflicted reasons and my brain feels like that one accursed hoover bag you refuse to empty, because there is no way of doing so that won't turn the neighbourhood into Silent Hill. I need to avoid any complicated write-ups, or my brain will detonate similarly and paint north London grey.
Ah, a minigolf game! I think I can just about hack the concept of minigolf, on this most desperate of Mondays. It is golf but mini. Bonzai golf. Digestible! Intuitive! Why, I've managed to write 100 words without even looking at the Steam page. Let's do so now. Wait a minute, this isn't minigolf. It's Mini Mini Golf Golf. What is Mini Mini Golf Golf? "Destabilize the present and plunge into a neon psychohistory of a bizarre entity in distress," the Steam page explains. "This is not a game about minigolf." It is too late to flee.
 Read more
articles.title: It's never too early in the week to play 4D minigolf

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
I was excited for Slitterhead, an action adventure game by Bokeh Studio, a studio founded by none other than your boy Keiichiro Toyama: the creator of Silent Hill, Gravity Rush, and the Siren series. And within that first hour, Slitterhead's body-possessing and Hong Kong-inspired streets had me thinking, "Is this it, the sleeper hit of 2024?!"
No, sadly not. It's no doubt built a compelling universe filled with brain-sucking aliens that masquerade as humans, and it attempts plenty else besides: bouncing between bodies as you stealth around dingy apartment blocks, fighting with blood katanas, and gorging on pools of red plasma to refuel skills, many of which require more body-flitting. Thing is, they are ultimately just attempts, attempts that fall victim to an emptiness and jitteriness that quickly reveals Slitterhead's true, irritating form.
Read more
articles.title: Slitterhead review: body-hopping action horror that's best left dispossessed

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: GMP (GNU MP nebo též libgmp) je otevřená knihovna pro práci s čísly v libovolně přesné aritmetice, která může pracovat s celými čísly, racionálními čísly a čísly v plovoucí řádové čárce.
articles.title: Knihovna GMP: aritmetika s neomezenou přesností

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Při programování IBM PC je třeba zajistit volání nějakého podprogramu v pravidelných intervalech. Realizace formou čekacích smyček je většinou nepraktická, proto je výhodnější využít časovač představovaný čipem 8253.
articles.title: Časovač 8253 a systém přerušení na IBM PC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CSIRT.CZ)
articles.description: Podíváme se na ukrývání kódu v metadatech, na zranitelnost ve Windows zneužitelnou pouhým kliknutím pravého tlačítka myši, opět se budeme věnovat ransomwaru, zaměříme se také na škodlivý balíček fabrice a zranitelnosti v GitLabu.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: pašování škodlivého kódu v metadatech souborů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Fedora 42 povýší spin s prostředím KDE Plasma na edici. Operační systém FreeBSD bootuje na telefonu PinePhone Pro. Týmu projektu Redox OS se podařilo systém Redox spustit na počítači Raspberry Pi 4.
articles.title: Fedora KDE Plasma povýší na edici, FreeBSD bootuje na na PinePhone Pro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: SDL3 nastavuje podporu Steam Controlleru jako aktivní, nová verze digiKam 8.5.0 vylepšuje detekci a rozpoznávání tváří, KDE opravuje spoustu chyb, pracuje na lepším běhu v HDR režimu.
articles.title: Končící výroba Apple Vision Pro, AMD ZenDNN 5.0 s podporou nových CPU EPYC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: V předchozích dvou článcích jsem z knihovny Detectron2 využíval modely trénované na konkrétní datové sadě, což byla v mém případě Common Objects in Context. Co když ale chci hledat něco, co v té datové sadě není?
articles.title: Detectron2 – hra na špióny

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V éře GNOME 47 a KDE Plasmy 6.2, obou běžících na Waylandu, v éře HDR, HiDPI i neceločíselného škálování může působit archaicky desktop stavějící na 23 let starých dogmatech. Přesto má ale desktop Trinity i pro rok 2025 co nabídnout.
articles.title: Trinity Desktop Environment (TDE) R14.1.13: závan starých časů o čtyři roky později

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Zavedení emulace NUMA zvyšuje výkon u Raspberry Pi 4 a 5 průměrně až o 46 % ve vícevláknových úlohách. Použití emulace NUMA dokáže patrně lépe využít paměťový řadič v SoC Broadcom nebo paměť samotnou. Povíme si, jak emulaci NUMA vyzkoušet a otestovat.
articles.title: NUMA pro Raspberry Pi 4 a 5 přináší vyšší výkon ve více vláknech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V článcích o scikit-learn jsme se zabývali zpracováním a predikcí numerických dat. Ovšem v praxi je zapotřebí pracovat i s dokumenty psanými v přirozeném jazyce. I v takových případech najde scikit-learn své využití.
articles.title: Využití knihovny scikit-learn pro zpracování a analýzu přirozeného jazyka (NLP)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Vondráček)
articles.description: Na Univerzitě Pardubice jsme se rozhodli nasadit IPv6 only síť na eduroamu. Získané zkušenosti nyní sdílím, protože mi při práci chyběl komplexní návod, který by spojil jednotlivé služby do jednoho řešení.
articles.title: Univerzitní eduroam pouze na IPv6: CLAT, DHCPv6 a logování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Operační systém pro jednodeskové počítače Raspberry Pi vyšel dnes s označením 2024–11–13. Novinkou je zvětšení výchozího swap souboru na 512 MB.  Soubor /etc/rc.local dříve ukazoval IP adresu, nyní se tato funkce přesunula do  /etc/issue.d/IP.issue.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi OS 2024-11-13 s větším swapem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: PeoplePath)
articles.description: Dne 27. listopadu 2024 od 18:00 společnost PeoplePath pořádá IT workshop s názvem "The One Billion Row Challenge - je PHP rychlejší než Java?". Akce se koná v salonku v 1. patře v restauraci U Salzmannů v Plzni. Drobné občerstvení a nápoje jsou samozřejmostí a vstupné je zdarma.
articles.title: ITWorkshop v Plzni: The One Billion Row Challenge - je PHP rychlejší než Java?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Pokud chcete provozovat Kubernetes na vlastním hardware, Rancher je jednoduchý a efektivní způsob, jak toho docílit. Umožní vám jednoduše vytvořit a spravovat Kubernets cluster na vlastních virtuálních serverech. Používat Rancher se naučíte na dalším školení Rancher – Kubernetes na vlastním hardware, které proběhne 25. a 26. listopadu a uskuteční se online.
articles.title: Rancher: provozujte Kubernetes na vlastním hardware (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na serveru GOG.com můžete zdarma získat hru Diggles: The Myth of Fenris. Ve hře ovládáte trpaslíky, kteří dolují nerosty, sbírají houby a bojují s nepřáteli.
articles.title: Hra zdarma na GOG.com Diggles: The Myth of Fenris

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linus Torvalds podle očekávání vydal linuxové jádro 6.12. Nová verze přináší mnoho nových funkcí, novou podporu hardwaru a naopak odstraňuje staré neudržované části. Dobrou zprávou také je, že se tato verze stane letošní verzí jádra s dlouhodobou podporou (LTS).
articles.title: Vyšlo linuxové jádro 6.12, jde o letošní verzi s dlouhou podporou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Linuxová distribuce OpenWrt, která se zaměřuje na provoz síťových prvků, již velmi dlouho používá vlastního správce balíčků opkg. Zástupci projektu oznámili, že budoucí verze budou místo toho používat správce balíčků apk z distribuce Alpine Linux.
articles.title: OpenWrt mění balíčkovací systém, z vlastního opkg přechází na apk

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Meta dostala od EU pokutu 797,72 miliónů eur za Marketplace, který je sice zdarma, ale uživatelé zde „platí“ svými daty. EU však namítá, že Marketplace poškozuje ostatní možné konkurenční služby.
articles.title: Meta dostala od EU pokutu 800 miliónů eur za Marketplace

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Neziskovka Iuridicum Remedium (IuRe) oznámila termín konání Cen Velkého bratra. Uskuteční se 18. března 2025 a půjde již o dvacátý ročník.
articles.title: IuRe se ohlédne za dvěma dekádami ochrany soukromí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V červenci jsme informovali, že umělá inteligence Google si celkem dobře vedla v Mezinárodní matematické olympiádě. Například v testu GSM-8k dosahují LLM běžně 96% úspěšnosti.  Společnost EpochAI vyvinula nový matematický test pro AI s názvem FrontierMath na který jsou současné LLM krátké. Claude a Gemini vyřešily jen 2 % úkolů, o1 a GPT jen 1 %.
articles.title: Nový test FrontierMath AI nezvládá

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Amazon teprve asi dva týdny prodává svoji první barevnou čtečku elektronických knih Kindle Colorsoft.  Někteří zákazníci si však stěžují na displej. V dolní části je v některých případech vidět světle žlutý nádech a u okrajů je také nepatrná změna barvy.
articles.title: Kindle Colorsoft má problémy s displejem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Raspberry Pi má od května jednoduchý vzdálený přístup Raspberry Pi Connect z libovolného webového prohližeče. Je možný jak grafický, tak terminálový přístup. V červnu byl rozšířen počet podporovaných zařízení a nyní jsou podporovány snad všechna zařízení od Raspberry Pi Zero po Raspberry Pi 5.
articles.title: Vylepšený Raspberry Pi Connect

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Wi-Fi 8, označované také jako IEEE 802.11bn Ultra High Reliability, přijde kolem roku 2028 a bude upřednostňovat lepší uživatelský zážitek před navyšováním rychlosti komunikace mezi zařízeními a přístupovými body. Wi-Fi 8 si totiž klade za cíl zlepšit efektivitu sítě, snížit rušení a přetížení pro spolehlivější připojení.
articles.title: Wi-Fi 8 vymění další navýšení rychlosti za vyšší spolehlivost

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Loki je nástroj na sběr, ukládaní a prohlížení logu. Je to nástroj od Grafany, takže je s ní přímo integrovaná. Připravili jsme pro vás nové školení Loki – Log management v Grafaně, na kterém se naučíte nasadit Loki Stack (Loki, Grafana a Promtail) a budete do něj schopni ukládat logy. Dále se naučíte, jak logy prohledávat, ukážeme si, jak nastavit retenci logu i jak nad daty z logu dělat dashboardy a alerting.
articles.title: Loki: log management v Grafaně (školeni)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři redakčního systému WordPress vydali novou verzi 6.7 s kódovým označením „Rollins“, které odkazuje na jazzového saxofonistu Sonnyho Rollinse. Hlavní novinkou vydání je představení nového moderního vzhledu Twenty Twenty-Five. Je navržen s ohledem na flexibilitu je vybaven řadou voleb stylů, blokových vzorů a barevných palet, díky kterým nabízí snadné přizpůsobení webu.
articles.title: WordPress 6.7 přináší vzhled Twenty Twenty-Five a funkci Zoom Out

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Red Hat oznámila vydání podnikové linuxové distribuce Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.5. Mezi hlavní novinky patří několik nových systémových rolí, včetně nové role sudo pro automatizaci konfigurace sudo ve velkém rozsahu. Dále je k dispozici Red Hat Satellite 6.16 s podporou instalace Satellite Serveru a nové možnosti správy souborů ve webové konzoli pro provádění běžných úloh správy souborů bez použití příkazového řádku.
articles.title: Vyšel Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.5 se systémovou rolí sudo a Podmanem 5.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Nadace Mozilla Foundation propustila 30 % svých zaměstnanců, protože podle organizace čelí „neúprosnému náporu změn“. Výkonná ředitelka Nabiha Syedová oznámila zaměstnancům propouštění 30. října. Zároveň potvrdila zrušení dvou divizí nadace – propagace a globální programy.
articles.title: Mozilla Foundation propouští 30 % zaměstnanců a ruší některá oddělení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V rámci iniciativy QNX Everywhere je nově k dispozici operační systém QNX 8 pro osobní použití a výuku zdarma. Nabídkou bezplatného přístupu ke QNX 8 chce společnost BlackBerry umožnit jednotlivcům zkoumat, učit se a vyvíjet na této platformě bez tradičních licenčních a finančních překážek. Je to zajímavé řešení pro bastlíře, studenty a profesionály z oboru, kteří se zajímají o vestavěné systémy pro nekomerční účely.
articles.title: QNX 8 je zdarma pro výuku a osobní projekty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Stork poskytuje webové grafické rozhraní pro monitorování, řešení problémů a údržbu konfigurace DHCP serverů Kea. Nabízí centrální bod pro správu serverů Kea, včetně integrace s LDAP pro ověřování a autorizaci správců. Grafické rozhraní umožňuje správcům sítě snadno provádět aktualizace konfigurace služby DHCP, aniž by se museli potýkat s neznámým rozhraním CLI.
articles.title: Stork 2.0.0 nabízí grafické rozhraní pro správu DHCP serveru Kea

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: V utorok 12. novembra vyšla najnovšia verzia vývojovej platformy .NET vo verzii 9. Nová verzia bola ohlásená už tradične počas novembrovej online .NET konferencie, ktorá sa koná 12.-14. novembra.
articles.title: .NET 9 prináša výkonnostné zmeny a opravu chýb

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Linuxové jádro verze 6.13 je teprve na cestě. V rámci ní chystá AMD přepnutí svých procesorů z architektonicky staršího řízení provozních parametrů pomocí ACPI CPUfreq na vlastní ovladač AMD P-State. Prvotní měření Phoronixu ukazují, že výsledkem bude úspornější chod, resp. vyšší výkon.
articles.title: Test AMD P-State na EPYC 9005 na jádru 6.13 ukazuje, že AMD se dobře připravila

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: O půlnoci z pondělí na úterý příští týden bude zahájen prodej kusově omezené bílo-šedé varianty přenosné konzole Steam Deck OLED za cenu 679 dolarů. Zařízení mohou zakoupit Steam uživatelé s nějakým předchozím nákupem na Steamu před listopadem 2024 a kteří současně nemají ban.
articles.title: Limitovaná edice Steam Deck OLED v bílém provedení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Od 1. března příštího roku zvýší sdružení CZ.NIC velkoobchodní cenu domény .CZ na 160 korun (bez DPH) za jeden kalendářní rok. Dosud byla velkoobchodní cena české národní domény 145 korun (bez DPH), jedná se tedy o zvýšení o 15 korun.
articles.title: CZ.NIC zvýší velkoobchodní cenu domény na 160 korun bez DPH

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Společnost initMAX pořádá webinář zdarma, tentokrát na populární téma bezpečnosti - Zabbix: Security Best practices + External Vault. Rezervujte si datum 14. listopadu 2024 od 10:00 do 12:00. Zabezpečení Zabbixu - pokryjeme ochranu komunikace frontendu, serveru, proxy, databáze a napojení na externí klíčenky (HashiCorp, CyberArk, OpenBAO), včetně praktické ukázky propojení.
articles.title: Zabbix: Security Best practices + External Vault - webinář zdarma

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ve dvou nově vydaných Intel Security Advisory (INTEL-SA-01079, INTEL-SA-01101 informuje americký výrobce o opravě tří zranitelností svých procesorů Xeon.
articles.title: Intel opravuje tři zranitelnosti CPU Xeon s SGX, vydal aktualizaci mikrokódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linux je v síťovém prostředí jako doma, může zastat prakticky všechny potřebné role od směrovače (router), přes DHCP, DNS až po souborový server Samba pro Microsoft Windows. Přijďte se to všechno naučit na naše třídenní školení s názvem Linux: správa počítačové sítě.
articles.title: Linux a správa počítačové sítě (školení)

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pomocí DNA vyrobili diamantové fotonické krystaly. Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury. AWS Cloud Day Prague 2024. Synology Experience Day 2024. Pure Storage zjednodušuje migraci podnikových prostředí VMware do cloudu Microsoft Azure. Chris Keller z AWS přiblížil na Cloud Day Prague novinky.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Chemie ultratěžkých prvků moscovia (115) a nihonia (113) má souviset s relativistickými efekty. Navrhují vznik temné energie v černých dírách. Kvantové provázání přežije i chemickou reakci. Ničení nebezpečných objektů jejich stáhnutím do atmosféry. Temná hmota by mohla hvězdám zajistit nesmrtelnost.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Magický grafen může být supravodivý jen do 60 K

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 46/2024

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Máme zde výprodej na Black Friday a ceny od Dckeyoffer jsou opravdu skvělé když sháníte originální doživotní licence na Windows. Během výprodeje na Black Friday máme vysoké slevy na platné licence na Windows a Office. Zejména klíč na Windows 11 je dnes nejžádanější, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Při výprodeji Black Friday je doživotní licence Windows 11 jen za €20, za Office €24

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled říjnových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za říjen 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Umělá inteligence zvyšuje náklady na datová centra, hlavně kvůli spotřebě elektřiny. Hospodářská komora: Zákon o kybernetické bezpečnosti výrazně zvýší náklady pro firmy. Global Mobile Broadband Forum 2024: 5.5G a AI jako základ nové éry mobilní komunikace. Digitální podnikové služby v Česku nabírají na síle: 175 tisíc zaměstnanců, robotizace a nové investice táhnou růst. Dell Technologies rozšiřuje portfolio Dell AI Factory o nové servery PowerEdge. Agentforce od Salesforce: důvěryhodní, autonomní agenti s umělou inteligencí posilují pracovní síly ve firmách.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Umělá inteligence zvyšuje náklady na datová centra, hlavně kvůli spotřebě elektřiny

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Matematiku a přírodní vědu prý spojuje stejná role náhodných procesů a pravděpodobnosti. Opice, Shakespeare a Rossův–Littlewoodův paradox. Vědci odhalili původ meteoritů dopadajících na Zemi.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Že by za Fermiho paradox mohla umělá inteligence?

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 45/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: HP Wolf Security: nové důkazy o útocích prostřednictvím malwaru generovaného AI. Matrix odhalí kvalitu a efektivitu agilního vývoje. Platformové inženýrství může naplnit přísliby přístupu DevOps. Úloha AI v řízení finančních rizik v Evropě. V grafenu poprvé detektovali elektronové víry. Asseco představuje širokou škálu inovací v rámci své mezinárodní skupiny.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: V grafenu poprvé detektovali elektronové víry

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Robotický lovec s umělou inteligencí ochrání kritickou infrastrukturu před útoky dronů . Antihmota v kosmickém záření znovu otevírá otázku temné hmoty v podobě části WIMP. Asteroid, který vyhubil dinosaury, mohl současně odstartovat zemědělství mravenců.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Sonda Psyche opět posunula rekord v laserové komunikaci

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 44/2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: AlmaLinux byl vydán v nové stabilní verzi 9.5 (Mastodon, 𝕏). S kódovým názvem Teal Serval. Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu a v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: AlmaLinux 9.5

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Něco pro pařany místo klávesnice: MoveMaster hybrid joystick, RSG 1 za 4 952 Kč. Vše nastavitelné. Verze pro praváky i leváky. Ve dvou barvách. Může být příjemné. Má někdo zkušenost?
articles.title: MoveMaster hybrid joystick, RSG 1

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Po 9 týdnech vývoje od vydání Linuxu 6.11 oznámil Linus Torvalds vydání Linuxu 6.12. Přehled novinek a vylepšení na LWN.net: první a druhá polovina začleňovacího okna a Linux Kernel Newbies. Po dvaceti letech byla do upstreamu začleněna real-timová podpora (PREEMPT_RT).
articles.title: Linux 6.12

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: OpenWrt, tj. linuxová distribuce primárně určená pro routery a vestavěné systémy, přechází z vlastního balíčkovacího systému opkg na apk z Alpine Linuxu.
articles.title: OpenWrt přechází z opkg na apk

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost TUXEDO prodávající počítače s předinstalovaným Linuxem vyvíjela moduly linuxového jádra ke svému hardwaru pod licencí GPL-3.0+. Verze GPL-3.0+ ale není kompatibilní s verzí GPL-2.0, pod kterou je k dispozici linuxové jádro. Po prodiskutování v LKML TUXEDO mění licenci svých modulů z GPL-3.0+ na GPL-2.0+. U svého vlastního kódu hned. U přispěvatelů musí vyžádat souhlas s přelicencováním.
articles.title: TUXEDO mění licenci svých modulů linuxového jádra z GPL-3.0+ na GPL-2.0+

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 8.5.0 (𝕏) správce sbírky fotografií digiKam (Wikipedie). Přehled novinek i s náhledy v oficiálním oznámení (NEWS). Nejnovější digiKam je ke stažení také jako balíček ve formátu AppImage. Stačí jej stáhnout, nastavit právo ke spuštění a spustit.
articles.title: digiKam 8.5.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Počítačová hra Half-Life 2 slaví 20. narozeniny. Při této příležitosti společnost Valve vydala velkou aktualizaci a do pondělí 18. listopadu do 19:00 je hra na Steamu zdarma napořád. Na YouTube byl publikován dokument o Half-Life 2. Nejen o vývoji hry, ale také o tom, jak jim došly peníze, jak byli hacknuti a na internet unikla rozpracovaná verze, jak se s nimi soudil vlastní vydavatel a jak se zrodila služba Steam.
articles.title: Half-Life 2 slaví 20. narozeniny

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Prometheus (Wikipedie), tj. open source řešení pro monitorování systémů a aplikací, byl vydán v nové major verzi 3.0. Po sedmi letech od vydání major verze 2.0.
articles.title: Prometheus 3.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Ve věku 96 let zemřel Thomas Eugene Kurtz, americký informatik, který spolu s Johnem Georgem Kemenym vytvořil programovací jazyk BASIC.
articles.title: Zemřel Thomas Eugene Kurtz, spolutvůrce programovacího jazyka BASIC

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: OpenMP (Open Multi-Processing, Wikipedie) ARB (Architecture Review Board) vydal specifikaci OpenMP API (Application Programming Interface) 6.0 pro paralelní programování. Ke stažení PDF API (964 stránek) a PDF Examples (631 stránek).
articles.title: OpenMP API 6.0

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As of today the first handful of commits have landed in LLVM Git ahead of next year's LLVM 20.0 for beginning to enable the AMDGPU compiler back-end for "GFX950", the next iteration of the CDNA family for Instinct accelerators...
articles.title: AMD Begins Adding "GFX950" GPU Support To LLVM For Next CDNA Accelerator

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Linux kernel Workqueue (WQ) is used for handling asynchronous process execution. For the past many years there has been an upper limit on the number of workqueue execution contexts per CPU at 512, but with Linux 6.13 that is being quadrupled to a limit of 2048...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 Quadrupling Workqueue Concurrency Limit

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Over the past year we have seen Canonical engineers focus more on optimizing the performance potential of Ubuntu Linux. With Ubuntu 25.04 they are now using the -O3 compiler optimization level by default and there has been other efforts like better performance tooling on Ubuntu and frame pointers by default. Another area they have been exploring is making use of Profile Guided Optimizations (PGO) for faster performance in certain scenarios...
articles.title: Ubuntu Praises 5~7% PGO Compiler Optimization Performance Benefits

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: All of the block subsystem changes were sent out today for the in-development Linux 6.13 kernel, including a prominent set of NVMe additions...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 Rolling Out NVMe 2.1 Support & NVMe Rotational Media

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: At the beginning of November I wrote about AMD Linux engineers posting Linux patches enabling a new "ERAPS" feature for Zen 5. ERAPS wasn't talked about by AMD at the Zen 5 launches of the Ryzen 9000 / Ryzen AI 300 series or with the more recent EPYC 9005 "Turin" launch but when enabled, the Enhanced Return Address Prediction Security feature can help deliver some additional gains on new AMD Zen 5 systems by allowing some existing software security mitigations to be avoided. Here are some preliminary comparison benchmarks showing the benefit in affected workloads for using ERAPS on Linux with AMD Zen 5.
articles.title: New AMD ERAPS Feature Yields Additional Performance Gains On Zen 5

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: GCC 15 feature development is now officially over with entering stage three development to focus on fixing compiler bugs...
articles.title: GCC 15 Compiler Development Shifts From Features To Bug Fixing

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With last month's Raspberry Pi OS update they now default to Wayland on all Raspberry Pi models alongside various other operating system improvements. Out today is the latest iteration of the Debian-based Raspberry Pi OS with software updates and other changes...
articles.title: Raspberry Pi OS Now Defaults To 512MB Swap, Updates Labwc Compositor

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following AMX-FP8 support, AMX-AVX512, and other new Intel CPU ISA features being added to the LLVM Clang 20 compiler codebase, the Intel Diamond Rapids target is now upstreamed for allowing "-march=diamondrapids" targeting for these next-generation Xeon processors...
articles.title: LLVM Clang 20 Merges Intel Diamond Rapids Support With "-march=diamondrapids"

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: DXVK 2.5 released one week ago with better video memory management handling, various Direct3D additions, and more. DXVK 2.5.1 is out today to fix a "major regression" as well as a few other bugs...
articles.title: DXVK 2.5.1 Released To Fix A Major Regression & Other Bugs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Along with the early Bcachefs pull request for Linux 6.13, SUSE engineer David Sterba submitted all of the Btrfs file-system feature updates in an early pull request for this next kernel version. Btrfs is seeing new performance optimizations and other enhancements for Linux 6.13...
articles.title: Btrfs With Linux 6.13 Delivers Performance Improvements & Other Features

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The third weekly beta release of FreeBSD 14.2 is now available for testing ahead of the planned stable release in early December. Besides a few fixes notable to FreeBSD 14.2-BETA3 is that they are now putting out OCI container images among their release media...
articles.title: FreeBSD 14.2 Beta 3 Released - FreeBSD Now Publishing OCI Container Images

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The ARM64 (AArch64) architecture changes have been submitted for the now-open Linux 6.13 merge window...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 For ARM64 Brings GCS Support & Protected VMs With Arm CCA

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As expected, minutes ago Linus Torvalds just released the Linux 6.12 kernel as stable. Linux 6.12 brings many new features, new hardware support, and is rounded out by the fact of expected to become this year's Long Term Support (LTS) kernel version...
articles.title: Linux 6.12 Released With Real-Time Capabilities, Sched_Ext, More AMD RDNA4 & More

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ahead of the Linux 6.12 kernel release expected today there is a last minute "x86/urgent" pull request. Notable with this last minute x86 urgent fixes for Linux 6.12 -- and also to be back-ported to prior kernel versions -- is working around an issue with AMD Ryzen Zen 4 client processors such as the Ryzen 7000/8000 series processors when making use of virtualization that could lead to the host randomly being rebooted...
articles.title: Linux Fixes Hosts Randomly Rebooting During Virtualization With Ryzen 7000/8000 CPUs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As part of the SLAB (SLUB) allocator updates pending for the upcoming Linux 6.13 cycle is a new "slab_strict_numa" option that is reported to further help ARM Linux performance such as for Ampere Computing servers...
articles.title: Linux 6.13 Adding "slab_strict_numa" SLAB Option For Helping ARM Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Archinstall is the convenient text/CLI-based installer for Arch Linux that allows getting the Linux distribution easily installed in a matter of minutes. Released today is Archinstall 3.0 that overhauls the Arch Linux installer with now using the curses library for rendering of the text interface...
articles.title: Archinstall 3.0 Overhauls The Text-Based Arch Linux Installer

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Rust Coreutils 0.0.28 "uutils" has been released for this implementation of the GNU Coreutils utilities within the Rust programming language for better memory safety and greater robustness. With the Rust Coreutils 0.0.28 there is increased GNU compatibility as well as better performance...
articles.title: Rust Coreutils 0.0.28 Delivers Better Performance & Increased Compatibility

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Bcachefs has now joined the party of various kernel components sending in preemptive pull requests ahead of the Linux 6.13 merge window that is expected to open following the expected Linux 6.12 release on Sunday...

You could play everything chronologically, essentially living in the meta-narrative to see how each game built upon the proposed tech of the time. You could also treat UFO 50 as the grab bag it is, dipping in and out of games like an all-you-can-eat buffet.

The Thief’s Key will grand you access to red doors that dot the early areas of the game. You won’t even be able to get off the first continent without it. Thankfully, it’s in an incredibly conspicuous spot. Chances are, if you spend any time exploring, you’ll eventually make your way there.


The Thief’s Key is located in the Dreamer’s Tower, which could be considered the first dungeon of the game. To get there, you first want to head North from Aliahan (the starting town). You’ll see a bridge, so head West over it. Once across, start…

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Nintendo Online is currently offering an amazing deal as part of the Japanese giant's Black Friday offerings. You can practically reduce your expense by half. However, it's not a direct 50% discount, and there's a caveat—you'll need a friend to join the party.


The latest offering is available for both the individual membership and the one with the Expansion pack. The terms on both offers are pretty much the same, although the one with the Expansion Pack is far more expensive. Nevertheless, you and your friend can get 50% savings on an annual membership by availing of the offer before December 1.


Nintendo Online's discount is a must-buy


Usually, an offer of a 50% discount on any annual membership is excellent, and Nintendo Online is almost a mandatory item to get if you own a Switch. The option with Expansion Pack includes several paid DLCs as well, making it even better (although the price is higher).




If you purchase any of the two 12-month subscription tiers, you'll have to pay the full price. However, you'll be mailed a code within 72 hours of your purchase. This code will duplicate your purchase for your friend, allowing them to get 12 months of subscription.


Hence, you and your friend can prepare this arrangement and then split the bills. Alternatively, it could be a perfect gift for a loved one who has recently joined the Nintendo ecosystem. With the festive season coming very soon, this discount is a great choice.


Note that the discount is available only once per user, but it's also available for existing members. In other words, you'll get the benefits if you're an old customer who wants to extend his membership. The additional code will be identical to the subscription you get. If you choose to pay extra to get the membership with the Expansion Pack, the code will also reflect the same.

The post Nintendo Online’s Black Friday discount slashes price by half, but with caveats appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Nintendo Online’s Black Friday discount slashes price by half, but with caveats

articles.author: Christian Markle
articles.description:
Fans of One-Punch Man have been eagerly waiting for the next installation of its anime adaptation. While the third season of the anime is yet to receive an official release date, fans can indulge in ONE's creativity through Bug Ego. It's ONE's latest manga, and it's officially coming to Shonen Jump.


However, ONE is not working on the manga alone. While ONE handles the narrative, the artwork is brought to life by Kiyoto Shitara, the creator of Shinobuna! Chiyo-chan. Shonen Jump announced the series' arrival on X (formerly Twitter).




Bug Ego first had its magazine debut in Weekly Young Jump in April 2023 before transitioning to a monthly serialization in Ultra Jump in October. Both VIZ Media's Shonen Jump app and MANGA Plus are publishing the manga digitally, and four chapters are already available to read.


MANGA Plus described the story:


"Kindhearted high school transfer student Hitsujiya offers to help his lonely classmate Kokudo with a few social techniques and life hacks. However, Kokudo seems to know some true hacks that can alter the very fabric of reality. But is it real? What if there’s a 1% chance that it is real? Would you try these hacks?"


Image via Bandai Namco


About ONE


ONE is a celebrated webcomic artist best known for creating One-Punch Man. Interestingly, the version of One-Punch Man published by VIZ Media's Shonen Jump isn’t the original webcomic. Instead, it’s a polished rendition illustrated by Yusuke Murata, the artist behind Eyeshield 21. This collaboration has led to immense success, including two seasons of anime adaptations, with a third currently in production.


ONE's legacy doesn't end there. ONE is also the brilliant mind behind Mob Psycho 100, which is another critically-acclaimed series. It has received a three-season anime adaptation and even a live-action series.

The post One-Punch Man’s ONE’s new manga debuts in Shonen Jump appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: One-Punch Man’s ONE’s new manga debuts in Shonen Jump

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you are eagerly waiting for STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl's release on November 20, you can now have more clarity about when you'll be able to play the game.


After all, different developers follow different launch schedules, and that can also differ with the platform in question. Usually, some games tend to have separate schedules for PC and consoles. For STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl, there won't be any such case. The game is going to be available on all applicable platforms at the same time.


STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl release timings


Here are the release timings of STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl in different regions of the world. Note that the release date in some regions will be November 21 (mentioned by a * besides the applicable timings).



Auckland: 5 a.m. NZDT*


Sydney: 3 a.m. AEDT*


Tokyo: 1 a.m. JST*


Beijing: 12 a.m. CST*


New Delhi: 9:30 p.m. IST


Kyiv: 6 p.m. EET


London: 4 p.m. GMT


Prague: 5 p.m. CET


New York: 11 a.m. EST


Seattle: 8 a.m. PST


Sao Paulo: 1 p.m. BRT





Players located in any region not mentioned here can automatically find the applicable timings for their region by determining the time difference between their clock and any that are mentioned here.


Do note that while STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl is available in different editions, there's no early access. In simpler words, getting a Premium version won't allow you to play earlier than the rest. It will get you some excellent in-game benefits, however, which will be incredibly beneficial for your in-game journey.


Additionally, there won't be any New Zealand method as well, which often allows you to play a game earlier than its release in a specific region. That method works with games that are released at midnight in a given region. That privilege won't be there for Xbox users this time around, so they're in the same boat as PC users.

The post STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl release time across all regions revealed appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: STALKER 2 Heart of Chernobyl release time across all regions revealed
